text: Afribactrus is a monotypic genus of African dwarf spiders containing the single species, Afribactrus stylifrons. It was first described by J. Wunderlich & V. Nicolai in 1995, and has only been found in South Africa. ==See also== * List of Linyphiidae species ==References== Category:Linyphiidae Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of South Africa
title: Afribactrus
